Gotron worked hard to check the Iron Fist's computer for any viruses or err=
ors, but the ship was too high tech to get any it seemed.

Gotron: The Alli=
ance have to use me for something, I can't sit here forever. (Hint, hint, p=
oke, poke)

Burning Hammer unpacked his stuff and started to put it around =
his room, there were guns and knives galore, the guns look like they've bee=
n broken and glued back together again. The tiny knives were covered in rus=
t and dried blood, ruining their sharp edge and making it more painful to g=
et your head cut off with them. There were fragments from his kills laying =
about.

Burning Hammer: Just have to keep out the maid.

Burning Hammer thr=
ew himself on the floor and laughed almost biker thug like as he picked up =
an arm.

Burning Hammer: You thought you could kill me, but look who's dead=
!

He picks up a finger.

Burning Hammer: Ha! You stood there and cowered, =
well now you'll lay forever!

He picks up a piece that looks like an intern=
al part, then another piece that looked like a bit of optic.

Burning Hamme=
r: And you 2, you 2 idiots wouldn't leave when you needed to! And then you =
died! And your stupid kid hurt my ears! Oh, boo hooo! Waaaaa! Give me a bre=
ak! Bah! Why am I talking to this junk pile!

He flings the parts into a wa=
ll and laughs coldy.

Burning Hammer: Never did kill that damned kid, or th=
at big dork and that stupid old man, but you can't get everything perfect. =
Note to self, stop talking when your the only one around! Ahahahahahahahaha=
!.............
